task.summary: Default task
Added .gitignore
Added .gitignore
Added dependencies: maven, modules and libraries
Added base activity/fragment. Added code from old version of Hubblog for data representation and file/github management
Added actionbarsherlock and actionscontentview styles and images
Added missing resource files for various themes
Added view layout structure. Added fragment classes and directories.
Can dynamically add list of sites and their articles to sidebar.
Fixed support library dependency issues
Fixed header title not being found by findViewById
Sidebar is now showing list of all sites.
Sidebar is now showing list of articles. Issue with max height present.
Added view holder pattern to view adapters
Updated bootstrapping method
Re-jigged layout so full sidebar list is shown. Scrolling issue now, so need to re-jig layout again!
Fixed sidebar so it shows list of all sites/articles and scrolls properly
Tweaking look and feel of sidebar - added icons
Added glow to edit image icon
Added sidebar item highlight on click
Added actionbar icon for sidebar. Added code to change title when sidebar opened.
Added sidebar listener so article can be selected and shown in main view
Added webview interfaces for edit article. Added lots of web assets from old hubblog code
Fixed layout size issue with tab indicator. Fixed issue with html content not fitting to device width.
Added edit markdown fragment. Added styles to clear EditText widget along with scrolling
Changed edit markdown to use scrollview to provide better scrolling experience
Added subtitle to action bar for each view
Abstracted base activity class to clean up code a little. Added basic javascript methods for webview.
ArticleWebView is now updated with article content
Renamed Post to Article
Added methods / interface for fragments to trigger updates in each other
Refactored article fragment classes to use a base fragment
Added triggers to article and markdown fragments
Added null error checks and cleaned up trigger code. Removed unneeded interface
Added css elements for text area, but realised that textarea won't be useful :(. keeping around for reference tho.
Removed .css file and renamed html file for previewing article
Added commit article fragment with rough layout
